1: Humble prayer receives attentive listening and compassionate care.
2: Trust brings enduring protection and rescue
3: I receive mercy as I pray daily.
4: I lift my soul and receive joy
5: Mercy and forgiveness abound for all who call.
6: I pray, and my voice receives attentive listening.
7: I call and receive an answer.
8: Celebrate the supreme source whose works surpass all.
9: All peoples unite to honor the Creator.
10: The supreme source performs wondrous deeds with unrivaled greatness.
11: I walk in truth with a united, honoring heart
12: I praise wholeheartedly and honor you forever.
13: Great mercy lifts souls into freedom and life.
14: Keep higher wisdom before you and live in lasting peace.
15: Practice abundant compassion, patience, mercy, and truth.
16: I live in compassion, strength, and safety.
17: Clear help and comfort shine for all to see.
